name: The 3 a.m. Bus
description:
Bus at 3 a.m.

Please play and rate for the jam.

Game Description

You are a bus driver who is nearing the end of your shift. It is currently 3 a.m. and you still have a few stops to make before you can call it a day.

This game was made by 4 people. It was a team effort and we all worked hard. Please go and follow them

Team Members:
  • Red Ruby- Writer & Game Director
  • RetroKnight - Character Artist & Background Artist
  • VGMushroom- Sound Director & Music Composer
  • Fireaid - Programmer and UI Designer
Credits for sounds used:
  • bus_door_opening - 13FPanska_Sychra_Petr
  • Bus leaving busstop - cribbler
  • Bus door 1 - chimerical
